description: this is the identifier for the start of the PRTAFT01 UDP packet
the length of the packet (not including all characters up-to the comma which follows this number)
the valid time for this packet (usually 1 second behind actual time)
indication of whether the CRIO is successfully synchronised to PTP time ( 1 = synced, 0 = not-synced )
the internal hardware temperature of the CRIO
indicates the flight number for this packet ( an "empty" string here indicates that the CRIO hasn't been assigned a flight number )
indicates whether the FPGA code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
indicates whether the realtime code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
- currently unused but for future use (boolean, therefore 0,1 )
this number starts @ zero and increments with each UDP packet - used for verification of packet stream
a string to represent the percentage of CRIO hard disk currently used
- Which disk is being used, INT = internal flash : USB = usb flash drive : --- = NODATA!
- currently unused but for future use ( text, max string size = 6 characters )
the pressure altitude taken from  the ARINC429 bus (reading x 4 = altitude in feet)
the indicated air speed taken from the ARINC429 bus (reading is IAS(kts) x 32)
the radio altitude taken from the ARINC429 bus (reading is in feet x 4)
an unused boolean (true,false) placeholder
an unused boolean (true,false) placeholder
a boolean flag to indicate whether the temperature deicing heater is on or off
a boolean flag to indicate whether the aircraft is on the ground or in flight
a boolean flag to indicate whether the Heimann is performing a calibration
the raw data in counts taken from the Fwd Core Console JCI static monitor, static signal
the raw data in counts taken from the Fwd Core console JCI static monitor range/alarm signal
